g.text: • W^(l) = weight matrix at layer l
• b^(l) = bias vector at layer l
• Result: matrix same size as W^(l)
• Same size as bias vector b^(l)
• W^(l): (n^(l) × n^(l-1)) - weights from layer l-1 to l
• δ^(l): (n^(l) × 1) - error terms at layer l
Where n^(l) = number of neurons in layer l
Calculate δ^(l) for l = L-1, L-2, ..., 2
